synopsis.text: Pollyanna is a young, optimistic girl who loses her father and goes to live with her aunt, whom she has never met. Though her aunt initially seems cold, Pollyanna's cheerful and caring nature eventually warms her aunt's heart and brings joy to the whole town. She makes new friends and has uplifting adventures, maintaining a positive spirit even through difficult times. Despite strokes of misfortune, Pollyanna selflessly spreads light and changes attitudes with her lively, open, and courageous approach to life.
